actions.name: agent-add-rag
actions.description: Adds a new RAG to an agent in the database for the user.

actions.name: agent-create
actions.description: Creates a new agent in the database for the user.

actions.name: agent_delete
actions.description: Delete a specific agent by its ID

actions.name: agent_get
actions.description: Retrieve details of a specific agent

actions.name: agent-list
actions.description: Retrieves the list of agents created by and available to the user.

actions.name: agent_prompt_completion
actions.description: Prompt an agent with a message and get a response

actions.name: agent_update
actions.description: Update the details of a specific agent

actions.name: file_upload
actions.description: Upload a file to Straico API for processing.

actions.name: image_generation
actions.description: Enables users to generate high-quality images based on textual descriptions.

actions.name: prompt_completion
actions.description: Enables users to generate prompt completion based on a specified model.

actions.name: create_rag
actions.description: Create a new RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) base in the database.

actions.name: delete_rag
actions.description: Delete a specific RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) base by its ID.

actions.name: get_rag_by_id
actions.description: Retrieve a specific RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) base by its ID.

actions.name: list_rags
actions.description: List all RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) bases for a user.

actions.name: rag_prompt_completion
actions.description: Send a prompt to a specific RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) model.

actions.name: update_rag
actions.description: Update an existing RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) base with additional files.
